item.title: Iykot Hitech Toolroom Ltd Falls to 52-Week Low Amidst Weak Financial Metrics
item.description: Iykot Hitech Toolroom Ltd’s stock price touched a fresh 52-week low of Rs.10 today, marking a significant decline amid ongoing concerns over the company’s financial health and market performance. This new low comes despite a broadly positive market environment, highlighting the stock’s underperformance relative to its peers and the benchmark indices. Time: 7 minutes ago

item.title: SpiceJet Ltd Stock Falls to 52-Week Low of Rs.16.3 Amid Continued Downtrend

The airline sector stock has underperformed its peers and broader market indices, reflecting persistent financial and market pressures. Time: 8 minutes ago

item.title: Delhivery Ltd Sees Significant Open Interest Surge Amid Mixed Market Signals

item.title: Hitachi Energy India Ltd Sees Sharp Open Interest Surge Amid Strong Price Rally
item.description: Hitachi Energy India Ltd (POWERINDIA) has witnessed a significant surge in open interest (OI) in its derivatives segment, signalling heightened market activity and potential directional bets. The stock hit a new 52-week and all-time high of Rs 23,800 on 20 Feb 2026, outperforming its sector and broader indices, while open interest rose by 11.43% to 21,851 contracts, reflecting increased investor positioning ahead of anticipated market moves. Time: 18 minutes ago

item.title: Osia Hyper Retail Ltd Surges to Upper Circuit on Robust Buying Momentum
item.description: Osia Hyper Retail Ltd witnessed a remarkable rally on 20 Feb 2026, hitting its upper circuit limit with a 4.97% gain, closing at ₹10.98. This surge was driven by strong buying interest amid rising investor participation, despite the stock trading below its key moving averages. The stock outperformed its sector and the broader Sensex, signalling renewed market focus on this micro-cap retailing company. Time: 19 minutes ago

item.title: Sonu Infratech Ltd Hits Lower Circuit Amid Heavy Selling Pressure
item.description: Shares of Sonu Infratech Ltd, a micro-cap player in the construction sector, plunged sharply on 20 Feb 2026, hitting the lower circuit limit of ₹72.10. The stock recorded a maximum daily loss of 4.94%, underperforming both its sector and the broader market amid intense selling pressure and a marked decline in investor participation. Time: 19 minutes ago

item.title: Sheetal Cool Products Ltd Hits Lower Circuit Amid Heavy Selling Pressure
item.description: Sheetal Cool Products Ltd, a micro-cap player in the FMCG sector, witnessed a sharp decline on 20 Feb 2026, hitting its lower circuit limit as panic selling gripped investors. The stock closed at ₹323.05, down 5.0% on the day, underperforming both its sector and the broader market amid unrelenting selling pressure and a significant drop in trading volumes. Time: 19 minutes ago

item.title: Supreme Engineering Ltd Hits Upper Circuit Amid Strong Buying Pressure
item.description: Supreme Engineering Ltd, a micro-cap player in the Iron & Steel Products sector, surged to hit its upper circuit limit on 20 Feb 2026, reflecting robust buying interest despite its recent downgrade to a Strong Sell rating. The stock closed at ₹0.93, marking a daily gain of 1.09%, supported by a maximum permissible price band of 5% and a notable spike in demand that outpaced available supply. Time: 19 minutes ago
